consentModal.label: Cookies
consentModal.title: Intake24 imagwiritsira ntchito ma cookies!
consentModal.description: Timagwiritsira ntchito necessary ma cookies kuti tipereke zinthu zofunika, functionality ma cookies ogwirira ntchito kuti tikumbukire zomwe ogwiritsira ntchito amakonda komanso analytics ma cookies osanthula kuti atithandize kumvetsetsa ndikuwongolera zomwe ogwiritsa ntchito akumana nazo.

sections.title: M'mene timagwiritsira ntchito ma cookies ðŸ“¢
sections.description: Timagwiritsira ntchito necessary ma cookies kuti tipereke zinthu zofunika, functionality ma cookies ogwirira ntchito kuti tikumbukire zomwe ogwiritsira ntchito amakonda komanso analytics ma cookies osanthula kuti atithandize kumvetsetsa ndikuwongolera zomwe ogwiritsa ntchito akumana nazo..

sections.title: Ma cookies ofunikira Always Enabled
sections.description: Ma cookies ndi ofunikira kwambiri kuti tsamba lawebusayiti  ligwire ntchito bwino.

body.name: it24_cc
body.desc: Ma cookies amene  mwawakonda ndikuwavomereza ogwirisidwa ntchito ndi webusayiti Cookies.

sections.title: Ma cookies ogwira ntchito
sections.description: Ma cookies ogwira ntchito amalora webusayitiyi kukumbukira zambiri zomwe zimasintha monga momwe webusayitiyi imakhalira kapena kuoneka, monga chinenero chomwe mumakonda kapena dera lomwe muli.

body.name: ^it24(a|s)_
body.desc: Amasunga zokonda zazogwiritsa ntchito ndi kasinthidwe ka webusayiti.

sections.title: Ma cookies a kaunikidwe ndi ziwelengero
sections.description: Ma cookies a kaunikidwe ndi ziwelengero amatithandiza kumvesetsa momwe alendo amagwiritsira ntchito webusayitiyi kuti apitise patsogolo utumiki omwe umaperekedwa.Uthenga umatoleledwa ndi kusungidwa moti simungadziwike.

body.name: ^_ga
body.desc: Ma cookies a google amagwiritsidwa ntchito kusiyanitsa ogwiritsa ntchito ndi kusunga momwe mukugwiritsira ntchito.

sections.title: Uthenga wambiri
sections.description: Ngati muli ndi mafunso, chonde lumikizanani nafe.
